regex.name: lista
regex.expres: acestream:\/\/(.*?)">(.*?)< https://acestreamsearch.com/en/index.php cn=$doregex[search] https://acestreamsearch.com/en/index.php keep-alive */* XMLHttpRequest

regex.name: search
regex.expres: #$pyFunction import xbmc import xbmcaddon import xbmcgui def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m): dialog = xbmcgui.Dialog() d = dialog.input('Buscar Canal: ejemplo: Sky Sports', type=xbmcgui.INPUT_ALPHANUM).replace(" ", "+") return d
